mean_cn: n. 嘲笑，嘲笑的目标，笑柄
mean_en: the feeling that people express when they criticize and laugh at someone or something in an insulting way
sentence: The poor dinosaur is laughed at with derision because of its short fore limb.
sentence_trans: 这只恐龙短小的前肢成为其他恐龙的笑柄。
word_etyma: deri嘲笑 + sion 名词后缀 → derision 嘲笑
